org.bulldog.devices.lcd

Class I2CLcd

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bulldog.devices.lcd.I2CLcd

  • public class I2CLcd
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a HD44780 compatible lcd which is driven in 4 BIT mode behind an I2C Port Expander.
